description.english: You have defeated Mr. Pigeon... again!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu M. Pigeon... encore !
description.german: Du hast Mr. Pigeon besiegt … schon wieder!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Mister Piccione... di nuovo!
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Monsieur Pigeon... ¡otra vez!
description.dutch: Je hebt Mr. Pigeon verslagen... alweer!

description.english: You have searched the prologue from top to bottom.
description.french: Vous avez fouillé le prologue de fond en comble.
description.german: Du hast den Prolog bis in den letzten Winkel erkundet.
description.italian: Hai esaminato il prologo da cima a fondo.
description.spanish: Has registrado el prólogo de arriba a abajo.
description.dutch: Je hebt de proloog van onder tot boven doorzocht.

description.english: You have completed the Prologue in Akuma mode.
description.french: Vous êtes venu à bout du Prologue en mode Akuma.
description.german: Du hast den Prolog im Akuma-Modus abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Hai completato il prologo in modalità Akuma.
description.spanish: Has completado el prólogo en modo akuma.
description.dutch: Je hebt de proloog voltooid in Akuma-modus.

description.english: Soundwave is reasoned, everything is much calmer now.
description.french: Décirebelle est raisonnée, tout est bien plus calme désormais.
description.german: Soundwave ist vernünftig geworden und es ist jetzt um Einiges ruhiger.
description.italian: Décirebelle ha ritrovato la ragione e ora tutto è più calmo.
description.spanish: Has hecho entrar en razón a Soundwave, ahora todo es mucho más tranquilo.
description.dutch: Soundwave is redelijk. Alles is veel rustiger nu.

description.english: You have searched level 1 from top to bottom.
description.french: Vous avez fouillé le niveau 1 de fond en comble.
description.german: Du hast Level 1 bis in den letzten Winkel erkundet.
description.italian: Hai esaminato il livello 1 da cima a fondo.
description.spanish: Has registrado el nivel 1 de arriba a abajo.
description.dutch: Je hebt level 1 van onder tot boven doorzocht.

description.english: You have completed level 1 in Akuma mode.
description.french: Vous êtes venu à bout du niveau 1 en mode Akuma.
description.german: Du hast Level 1 im Akuma-Modus abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Hai completato il livello 1 in modalità Akuma.
description.spanish: Has completado el nivel 1 en modo akuma.
description.dutch: Je hebt level 1 voltooid in Akuma-modus.

description.english: You have defeated Weredad and his paper mountains.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Weredad et ses montagnes de papier.
description.german: Du hast Weredad und seine Papierberge besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Weredad e le sue montagne di carta.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Papá Lobo y a sus montañas de papel.
description.dutch: Je hebt Weredad en zijn papieren bergen verslagen.

description.english: You have searched level 2 from top to bottom.
description.french: Vous avez fouillé le niveau 2 de fond en comble.

description.spanish: Has registrado el nivel 2 de arriba a abajo.
description.dutch: Je hebt level 2 van onder tot boven doorzocht.

description.english: You have completed level 2 in Akuma mode.
description.french: Vous êtes venu à bout du niveau 2 en mode Akuma.
description.german: Du hast Level 2 im Akuma-Modus abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Hai completato il livello 2 in modalità Akuma.
description.spanish: Has completado el nivel 2 en modo akuma.
description.dutch: Je hebt level 2 voltooid in Akuma-modus.

description.english: You beat Gamer 3.0 at its own game.
description.french: Vous avez battu Gamer 3.0 à son propre jeu.
description.german: Du hast Gamer 3.0 mit seinen eigenen Waffen geschlagen.
description.italian: Hai battuto Gamer 3.0 al suo stesso gioco.
description.spanish: Has vencido a Gamer 3.0 en su propio juego.
description.dutch: Je hebt Gamer 3.0 verslagen in zijn eigen game.

description.english: You have completed level 3 in Akuma mode.

description.german: Du hast Level 3 im Akuma-Modus abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Hai completato il livello 3 in modalità Akuma.
description.spanish: Has completado el nivel 3 en modo akuma.
description.dutch: Je hebt level 3 voltooid in Akuma-modus.

description.english: Clonika and her clones are now only a bad memory.
description.french: Clonika et ses clones ne sont plus qu'un mauvais souvenir.
description.german: Clonika und ihre Klone sind nur noch eine böse Erinnerung.
description.italian: Ora Clonika e i suoi cloni sono solo un brutto ricordo.
description.spanish: Ahora Clonika y sus clones son solo un mal recuerdo.
description.dutch: Clonika en haar klonen zijn nu niets meer dan een slechte herinnering.

description.english: You have found the sentimonster and... Mayura!?

description.italian: Hai trovato il sentimostro e... Mayura?!
description.spanish: Has encontrado al sentimonstruo y... ¡¿a Mayura?!

description.english: You have saved Paris from the Machiavellian plans of Hawk Moth.

description.german: Du hast Paris vor den finsteren Plänen von Hawk Moth bewahrt.

description.spanish: Has registrado el nivel 6 de arriba a abajo.
description.dutch: Je hebt Parijs gered van de Machiavellistische plannen van Hawk Moth.

description.dutch: Koop een upgrade van Master Fu
